Handling Evidence in Equipoise
As indicated at
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 1.A.1.j
, resolve reasonable doubt in
favor
of the claimant if all procurable evidence, after being weighed, is found in approximate balance or equipoise.
38 CFR 3.102
dictates that the Veteran prevails when the evidence neither satisfactorily proves nor disproves an issue.
